(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD met)
      (NP (NNP Melvyn))
      (PP
        (ADVP
          (NP (DT the) (NN videographer))
          (RB recently))
        (IN while)
        (S
          (VP (VBG filming)
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (NNP Planet) (NNP Food)))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(met-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, met-2)
dobj(met-2, Melvyn-3)
det(videographer-5, the-4)
npadvmod(recently-6, videographer-5)
advmod(while-7, recently-6)
prep(met-2, while-7)
pcomp(while-7, filming-8)
prep(filming-8, for-9)
nn(Food-11, Planet-10)
pobj(for-9, Food-11)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN As)
    (S
      (NP (PRP we))
      (VP (VBD talked))
      (, ,))))


mark(talked-3, As-1)
nsubj(talked-3, we-2)
root(ROOT-0, talked-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VBD thought)
      (SBAR
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (MD would)
            (VP (VB be)
              (ADJP (JJ fun)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB make)
                      (NP
                        (NP
                          (NP (DT some) (NNP Video) (NNP Blogs))
                          (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
                            (NP (NNP Vlog))
                            (-RRB- -RRB-)))
                        (PP (IN on)
                          (NP (NNP Singapore) (NNP Food)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(thought-2, we-1)
root(ROOT-0, thought-2)
nsubj(fun-6, it-3)
aux(fun-6, would-4)
cop(fun-6, be-5)
ccomp(thought-2, fun-6)
aux(make-8, to-7)
xcomp(fun-6, make-8)
det(Blogs-11, some-9)
nn(Blogs-11, Video-10)
dobj(make-8, Blogs-11)
appos(Blogs-11, Vlog-13)
prep(Blogs-11, on-15)
nn(Food-17, Singapore-16)
pobj(on-15, Food-17)


(ROOT
  (SINV
    (PP (IN Since)
      (NP (NNP Nonya) (NN food)))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB still))
      (ADJP (RB very) (JJ much)))
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN rage))
      (PP (IN at)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NN moment))
          (, ,))))))


prep(much-7, Since-1)
nn(food-3, Nonya-2)
pobj(Since-1, food-3)

det(moment-12, the-11)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP we))
    (VP (VBD decided)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB start)
            (PP (IN with)
              (NP (DT the) (CD one) (NN dish)))
            (S
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (IN that))
                (S
                  (NP (PRP I))
                  (VP (VBP have)
                    (VP (VBN been)
                      (VP (VBN curious)
                        (PP (IN about)
                          (ADVP (RB ever)))
                        (PP (IN since)
                          (S
                            (VP (VBG watching))))))))
                (`` ``)))))))))


nsubj(decided-2, we-1)
root(ROOT-0, decided-2)
aux(start-4, to-3)
xcomp(decided-2, start-4)
prep(start-4, with-5)
det(dish-8, the-6)
num(dish-8, one-7)
pobj(with-5, dish-8)
advmod(curious-13, that-9)
nsubjpass(curious-13, I-10)
aux(curious-13, have-11)
auxpass(curious-13, been-12)
dep(start-4, curious-13)
prep(curious-13, about-14)
pcomp(about-14, ever-15)
prep(curious-13, since-16)
pcomp(since-16, watching-17)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP It))
    (VP (VBZ 's)
      (NP
        (NP (NN none) (JJ other))
        (PP (IN than)
          (NP (DT the) (NNP Rempah) (NNP Udang)))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Bibik) (NNP Kathryn))
      (PP (IN from)
        (NP (NNP Peramakan) (NN restaurant))))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB show)
        (NP (PRP us))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB how))
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB make)
                (NP (NNP Rempah) (NNP Udang))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S

      (PP (IN in)

          (NP (DT a) (JJ traditional) (NNP Nonya) (NN family))
          (FRAG
            (WHADVP (WRB where))))))
    (, ,)))

  (S
    (NP (PRP she))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (VP (VBN trained)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB cook)
              (PP (IN since)
                (NP (DT a)
                  (ADJP (RB very) (JJ young))
                  (NN age))))))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP She))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (RB very) (JJ meticulous)
        (PP (IN about)
          (S
            (VP
              (VP
                (ADVP (RB only))
                (VBG using)
                (NP (DT the) (JJS best) (NNS ingredients)))
              (CC and)
              (VP (VBG cooking)
                (NP (DT the) (JJ traditional) (NN way))))))))
    (. .)))

cop(meticulous-4, is-2)
advmod(meticulous-4, very-3)
root(ROOT-0, meticulous-4)
prep(meticulous-4, about-5)
advmod(using-7, only-6)
pcomp(about-5, using-7)
det(ingredients-10, the-8)
amod(ingredients-10, best-9)
dobj(using-7, ingredients-10)
cc(using-7, and-11)
conj(using-7, cooking-12)
det(way-15, the-13)
amod(way-15, traditional-14)
dobj(cooking-12, way-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP You))
    (ADVP (RB only))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB taste)
            (NP (PRP$ her) (NN food))
            (PP (IN at)
              (NP (NNP Peramakan))))))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB know)
            (SBAR
              (WHADJP (WRB how) (JJ much))
              (S
                (NP (NN passion))
                (VP (VBZ goes)
                  (PP (IN into)
                    (S
                      (VP (VBG cooking)
                        (NP (PRP$ her) (NNS dishes))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(have-3, You-1)
advmod(have-3, only-2)
root(ROOT-0, have-3)
aux(taste-5, to-4)
xcomp(have-3, taste-5)
poss(food-7, her-6)
dobj(taste-5, food-7)
prep(taste-5, at-8)
pobj(at-8, Peramakan-9)
aux(know-11, to-10)
xcomp(have-3, know-11)
advmod(much-13, how-12)
dep(goes-15, much-13)
nsubj(goes-15, passion-14)
ccomp(know-11, goes-15)
prep(goes-15, into-16)
pcomp(into-16, cooking-17)
poss(dishes-19, her-18)
dobj(cooking-17, dishes-19)


(ROOT
  (SINV
    (S
      (NP (PRP$ Her) (NN Beef) (NN Rendang))
      (VP (VBZ is)
        (ADJP (RB still) (JJ slow))
        (UCP
          (VP (VBN cooked)
            (PP (IN over)
              (NP (DT a) (NN charcoal) (NN fire))))
          (CC and)
          (ADJP (RB so) (RB far)))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT the) (JJS most) (NN tender)))
    (NP (NNP Beef) (NNP Rendang))))


poss(Rendang-3, Her-1)
nn(Rendang-3, Beef-2)
nsubj(slow-6, Rendang-3)
cop(slow-6, is-4)
advmod(slow-6, still-5)
dep(tender-18, slow-6)
dep(slow-6, cooked-7)
prep(cooked-7, over-8)
det(fire-11, a-9)
nn(fire-11, charcoal-10)
pobj(over-8, fire-11)
cc(cooked-7, and-12)
advmod(far-14, so-13)
conj(cooked-7, far-14)
cop(tender-18, is-15)
det(tender-18, the-16)
amod(tender-18, most-17)
root(ROOT-0, tender-18)
nn(Rendang-20, Beef-19)
nsubj(tender-18, Rendang-20)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
